company_overview.mission_statement: V-Art streamlines data licensing for brands and AI, transforming a slow and cumbersome process into a fast, efficient solution. They aim to unlock incremental revenue for brands and AI teams in compliance with regulations by streamlining internal licensing and providing faster access to high-quality data.
key_milestones: Raised $1.4 million in Seed funding (as of June 2023)
Developing an AI-enabled, blockchain-powered technology for IP licensing and management.
Participated in the Google for Startups Accelerator program.
Scaling the dataset licensing for LLMs.
company_overview.current_status: Seed stage, actively developing and scaling its platform for data licensing, participating in accelerator programs, and focusing on AI-driven bulk licensing and dataset licensing for LLMs.
company_overview.unique_value_proposition: V-Art offers a flexible, AI-enabled, blockchain-powered technology that reduces IP licensing and management from months to minutes, unlocking incremental revenue for brands and AI teams by streamlining internal licensing and providing faster access to high-quality data.
